== January 2008 US Teams Reports ==

== Projects ==

* The MichiganTeam hosted a <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MichiganTeam/Meetings/IRL-20080117|Bug Jam]]</nowiki> on January 17^th^ to learn about bug triaging for Ubuntu.  Way to go MichinganTeam B-) This is part of a larger initative by the US Teams Project to encourage people in US LoCo Teams level to improve Ubuntu within as a large group.

== Meetings ==

* The US Teams Project held a <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/USTeams/MeetingAgenda20080109|Meeting]]</nowiki> on January 9^th^ to discuss JoshuaChase the new GeorgiaUSTeam leader, Mentor Update and CommunityCouncil Preview.
